comments.author: Paps Mams

comments.text:
the movie is charged with raw emotions-love, longing, desperation, fear, 
and even hope.i can't say anything further as it may constitute spoilers. 
its something that one would like to watch and maybe do a second re-run. 
the falling in love is a must watch...the looks, the smiles...we all know 
how that is...great movie Mr Antonio Hens. Thank you for charging this to 
life's cruelties...(though i would have liked a different ending - but 
don't we all?)﻿
